item.description:
This is our perfect opportunity to practice all that you've learned in the recent workshops, before you forget.


This Sunday afternoon set is on July 17th. This is a unique opportunity to enjoy the summer day and practice all that you've learned at the previous day's workshops; without the pressure of being under watchful eyes, just you, your notes and the support of your fellow steppers.

Bring friends and family, all are welcome.

The venue is outdoors, open gazebo, with a covered top. Dress appropriately for weather conditions, it will occur rain or shine. Wear your Steppers of Boston shirts and gear. The dance floor is polished stone, comfy shoes are a must. This will be our 5th time bringing this unique, and fun experience to the steppers. Bring your lawn chair and snacks, if you like. (no grills or open flame)

We may draw a few spectators, of those folks that just happen to be walking by at the time. Membership to The Original Steppers of Boston Incorporated has it's privileges.

 

Please RSVP... we need an accurate headcount.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me wearing my Stepper's shirt & listen for the steppin' tunes

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Summer Steppin' Set in the Park 7/17/11 4:30pm
